actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To provide for general revenue sharing for States.
short_title: State and Local Spending Will Help Save America Act of 2010

summary.text: State and Local Spending Will Help Save America Act of 2010 - Appropriates $200 billion for quarterly payments to the states in FY2011 and 2012 by the Secretary of the Treasury on the basis of population to supplement state operating budgets. Prohibits the use of such funds to supplement state capital budgets .

titles.title: State and Local Spending Will Help Save America Act of 2010
To provide for general revenue sharing for States.
